add_comment.description: Add a comment or internal note to a task or folder

props.name: entityType
props.description: Select whether you want to add the comment to a task or folder

props.name: entityId
props.description: The ID of the task or folder to add the comment to

props.name: text
props.description: The text content of the comment

props.name: plainText
props.description: Whether the comment should be treated as plain text (no HTML formatting). Default is HTML formatting.

create_folder.description: Create a new folder in Wrike

props.name: parentFolderId
props.description: The ID of the parent folder where the new folder will be created. Leave empty to create at root level.

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the folder

props.name: description
props.description: The description of the folder

props.name: shareds
props.description: User IDs to share the folder with

props.name: project
props.description: Whether this folder should be created as a project with additional project settings

props.name: projectOwnerId
props.description: The ID of the user who will own the project (required when creating as project)

props.name: projectStartDate
props.description: The start date of the project (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

props.name: projectEndDate
props.description: The end date of the project (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

create_project.description: Create a new project in Wrike

props.name: parentFolderId
props.description: The ID of the parent folder where the project will be created. Leave empty to create at root level.

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the project

props.name: description
props.description: The description of the project

props.name: ownerIds
props.description: User IDs who will own the project

props.name: shareds
props.description: User IDs to share the project with

props.name: start_date
props.description: Project start date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

props.name: end_date
props.description: Project end date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

create_task.description: Create a new task in Wrike

props.name: folderId
props.description: The ID of the folder where the task will be created

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the task

props.name: description
props.description: The description of the task

props.name: status
props.description: The status of the task

props.name: importance
props.description: The importance/priority of the task

props.name: assignees
props.description: User IDs to assign to the task

props.name: start_date
props.description: Task start date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

props.name: due_date
props.description: Task due date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

props.name: duration
props.description: Task duration in minutes

props.name: customFields
props.description: Custom field values for the task

props.name: fieldId
props.description: Custom field identifier

props.name: value
props.description: Field value

find_folder.description: Retrieve folder / project metadata by ID or name

props.name: folderId
props.description: The ID of the folder/project to retrieve. If provided, other search criteria will be ignored.

props.name: title
props.description: Search for folders/projects by title (partial match)

props.name: parentIds
props.description: Search for folders/projects within specific parent folders

props.name: project
props.description: Filter to only return projects (folders marked as projects)

props.name: pageSize
props.description: Maximum number of folders/projects to return (max 1000)

props.name: authors
props.description: Filter by authors (users who created the folders)

props.name: owners
props.description: Filter by owners (users who own the projects)

find_task.description: Retrieve a task by its ID or lookup fields

props.name: taskId
props.description: The ID of the task to retrieve. If provided, other search criteria will be ignored.

props.name: title
props.description: Search for tasks by title (partial match)

props.name: folderId
props.description: Search for tasks within a specific folder

props.name: status
props.description: Filter tasks by status

props.name: importance
props.description: Filter tasks by importance/priority

props.name: assignees
props.description: Filter tasks by assignee user IDs

props.name: authors
props.description: Filter tasks by author user IDs

props.name: pageSize
props.description: Maximum number of tasks to return (max 1000)

props.name: sortField
props.description: Field to sort tasks by

props.name: sortOrder
props.description: Sort order for results

update_task.description: Update fields of an existing task in Wrike

props.name: taskId
props.description: The ID of the task to update

props.name: title
props.description: The new title of the task

props.name: description
props.description: The new description of the task

props.name: status
props.description: The new status of the task

props.name: importance
props.description: The new importance/priority of the task

props.name: assignees
props.description: User IDs to assign to the task (replaces existing assignees)

props.name: start_date
props.description: Task start date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

props.name: due_date
props.description: Task due date (format: YYYY-MM-DD)

props.name: duration
props.description: Task duration in minutes

props.name: customFields
props.description: Custom field values to update for the task

props.name: fieldId
props.description: Custom field identifier

props.name: value
props.description: New field value

upload_attachment.description: Upload a file and attach it to a task or folder

props.name: entityType
props.description: Select whether to attach the file to a task or folder

props.name: entityId
props.description: The ID of the task or folder to attach the file to

props.name: file
props.description: The file to upload and attach

props.name: fileName
props.description: Optional custom name for the uploaded file

new_folder.description: Fires when a new folder (or project) is created in Wrike.

props.name: parentFolderId
props.description: Optional: Only trigger for folders created in this specific parent folder

new_subtask_created.description: Triggers when a subtask is created.

props.name: parentTaskId
props.description: Optional: Only trigger for subtasks created under this specific parent task

new_task.description: Fires when a new task is created in Wrike (optionally within a folder).

props.name: folderId
props.description: Optional: Only trigger for tasks created in this specific folder
